name: Celestial
description: Go to haven where you meet angels and other celestial beings. You can communicate with them and ask them for guidance.

name: Drift
description: You find yourself on a drift track. You can use the drift track to travel to other planets and travel to other locations.

name: Wisdom
description: Use the wisdom to learn about the world and its people.

name: Dive
description: Dive and see the underwater world. Meet unusual creatures and visit the underwater cities.

name: Gravity
description: Spend entire day without feeling the effects of gravity.
